question: Why is the Battle of Vimy Ridge important in the Canadian history?
possible_answers: A. It was the last battle of the First World War.
B. It has come to symbolise Canada's becoming as a nation.
C. It was an important victory in the Boer War.
D. Out of it was formed the Canadian Corps.
main_question: Why is the Battle of Vimy Ridge important in the Canadian history?
answer: B. It has come to symbolise Canada's becoming as a nation.
explanatory_sentence: One Canadian officer said: 'It was Canada from the Atlantic to the Pacific on parade ... In those few minutes I witnessed the birth of a nation.' April 9 is celebrated as Vimy Day.
